description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代儒家学者和思想家，主张性恶论，对后世儒学及政治文化影响深远。
description.en: A Confucian scholar and thinker of the Warring States period in China, known for his theory that human nature is inherently bad. He had a profound influence on later Confucianism and political culture.

description.zh-cn: 儒家学派的创始人，荀子视其为真正的继承对象。
description.en: The founder of Confucianism, whom Xunzi regarded himself as the true successor to.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期儒家代表人物，主张性善论，与荀子的性恶论形成对立。
description.en: A representative figure of Confucianism during the Warring States period, who advocated the theory that human nature is inherently good, in opposition to Xunzi's theory of evil nature.

description.zh-cn: 法家代表人物，荀子的弟子。
description.en: A representative figure of Legalism and a disciple of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，法家代表人物，荀子的弟子。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty, a representative figure of Legalism, and a disciple of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 荀子的弟子，最能传承其学问与学说。
description.en: A disciple of Xunzi, considered the one who best inherited his teachings and theories.

description.zh-cn: 荀子的弟子。
description.en: A disciple of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 荀子认为的儒学正宗传人。
description.en: Considered by Xunzi to be the orthodox successor of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 儒家学者，被荀子批评。
description.en: A Confucian scholar who was criticized by Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 楚国相国，曾任命荀子为兰陵令，其死后荀子亦被解任。
description.en: Chancellor of the State of Chu who appointed Xunzi as the magistrate of Lanling. After his death, Xunzi was dismissed from the post.

description.zh-cn: 西汉末年宫廷史官，曾整理荀子著作，编撰成《孙卿书》。
description.en: A court historian of the late Western Han Dynasty who compiled Xunzi's writings into the book 'Sun Qing Shu'.

description.zh-cn: 唐代学者，于818年校勘与注解《孙卿书》，并重新命名为《荀子》。
description.en: A Tang dynasty scholar who, in 818, collated and annotated the 'Sun Qing Shu' and renamed it 'Xunzi'.

description.zh-cn: 清末维新派人士，在其《仁学》中批判荀子，认为中国两千年来的专制君权归咎于荀学。
description.en: A reformist of the late Qing Dynasty who criticized Xunzi in his work 'A Study of Benevolence', attributing two millennia of autocratic monarchy in China to Xunzi's teachings.

description.zh-cn: 宋代理学家，严厉批评荀子，几乎否认其为儒家，指责其思想“全是申、韩”。
description.en: A Neo-Confucian scholar of the Song Dynasty who severely criticized Xunzi, nearly denying his status as a Confucian and accusing his thought of being entirely that of Shen Buhai and Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 宋代理学家，批评荀子的性恶说，认为圣人之道因荀子而失传。
description.en: A Neo-Confucian scholar of the Song Dynasty who criticized Xunzi's theory of evil nature, believing that the way of the sages was lost because of him.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，是荀子的出生地。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States, and the birthplace of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，荀子曾在此任兰陵令并终老。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States, where Xunzi served as the magistrate of Lanling and spent his final years.

description.zh-cn: 战国七雄之一，荀子曾在此地的稷下学宫研习并担任祭酒。
description.en: One of the Seven Warring States, where Xunzi studied and served as libationer at the Jixia Academy.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期齐国设立的学术机构，荀子曾在此研习并三度担任祭酒。
description.en: An academic institution established by the State of Qi during the Warring States period, where Xunzi studied and served as libationer three times.

description.zh-cn: 楚国的一个县，荀子曾在此担任县令并终老。
description.en: A county in the State of Chu where Xunzi served as magistrate and spent his final years.

description.zh-cn: 由孔子创立的中国古代思想学派，荀子是其在战国时期的重要代表人物。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought founded by Confucius, of which Xunzi was a major representative during the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代哲学流派，主张以法治国。荀子的弟子韩非和李斯是其代表人物，荀子思想也影响了其发展。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosophical school that advocated for governance by law. Its representative figures, Han Fei and Li Si, were students of Xunzi, and Xunzi's thought influenced its development.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代哲学流派，荀子曾对其进行批评。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosophical school that was criticized by Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代哲学流派，荀子曾对其进行批评。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosophical school that was criticized by Xunzi.

en: Theory that human nature is evil

description.zh-cn: 荀子提出的核心哲学思想，认为人性本恶，善是后天人为教化的结果。此观点与孟子的性善论相对立。
description.en: The core philosophical idea proposed by Xunzi, which holds that human nature is inherently evil and that goodness is the result of acquired education and effort. This view stands in opposition to Mencius's theory of inherent goodness.

en: Theory that human nature is good

description.zh-cn: 孟子提出的核心哲学思想，认为人性本善。此观点与荀子的性恶论相对立。
description.en: The core philosophical idea proposed by Mencius, which holds that human nature is inherently good. This view stands in opposition to Xunzi's theory of evil nature.

description.zh-cn: 荀子著作的合集。最初由西汉刘向整理编定为《孙卿书》，唐代杨倞作注后改名为《荀子》。
description.en: A collection of Xunzi's writings. It was first compiled by Liu Xiang of the Western Han into the 'Sun Qing Shu' and later renamed 'Xunzi' by Yang Liang of the Tang Dynasty, who also added commentaries.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年中国的一场政治运动。在此期间的“批孔扬秦”运动中，荀子因其弟子韩非、李斯而受到赞扬。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976. During the 'Criticize Confucius, Praise Qin' campaign within this period, Xunzi was praised due to his disciples Han Fei and Li Si.

description.zh-cn: 荀子曾在稷下学宫研习，后三度被任命为祭酒，负责主持典礼。
description.en: Xunzi studied at the Jixia Academy and was later appointed three times as its libationer, responsible for presiding over ceremonies.

description.zh-cn: 荀子被春申君任命为楚国兰陵令。
description.en: Xunzi was appointed as the Magistrate of Lanling in the State of Chu by Lord Chunshen.

description.zh-cn: 荀子祖述孔子，自视为孔子的真正继承人。
description.en: Xunzi followed the teachings of Confucius and considered himself the true successor to Confucius.

description.zh-cn: 荀子在学术思想上承继自子弓，并称赞其为儒学正宗传人。
description.en: Xunzi intellectually inherited from Zigong and praised him as the orthodox successor of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是荀子的弟子。
description.en: Han Fei was a disciple of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 李斯是荀子的弟子，于公元前247年辞别荀子前往秦国。
description.en: Li Si was a disciple of Xunzi and left him in 247 BCE to go to the State of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 浮丘伯是荀子的弟子，被认为最能传承其学问。
description.en: Fuqiubo was a disciple of Xunzi and was considered the best at carrying on his teachings.

description.zh-cn: 张苍是荀子的弟子。
description.en: Zhang Cang was a disciple of Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 荀子批评孟子，视其为“瞀儒”，并反对其性善论。
description.en: Xunzi criticized Mencius, viewing him as a 'muddled Confucian' and opposing his theory of the goodness of human nature.

description.zh-cn: 荀子批评子思，并将其与孟子归为一类，视为“瞀儒”。
description.en: Xunzi criticized Zisi, lumping him together with Mencius and viewing him as a 'muddled Confucian'.

description.zh-cn: 荀子批评墨家学说，指责其只知严格节俭，却忽略了礼的作用。
description.en: Xunzi criticized Mohist doctrines, accusing them of only knowing strict frugality while ignoring the function of rites.

description.zh-cn: 荀子批评道家学派，如批评庄子只知道“天”而不知道人。
description.en: Xunzi criticized the Taoist school, for example, criticizing Zhuangzi for only knowing 'Heaven' but not man.

description.zh-cn: 性恶论是荀子提出的核心哲学思想。
description.en: The theory that human nature is evil is a core philosophical idea proposed by Xunzi.

description.zh-cn: 春申君任命荀子为兰陵令。
description.en: Lord Chunshen appointed Xunzi as the Magistrate of Lanling.

description.zh-cn: 春申君逝世，导致荀子被解除兰陵令的职务。
description.en: The death of Lord Chunshen led to Xunzi's dismissal from his post as Magistrate of Lanling.

description.zh-cn: 荀子提出的性恶论与孟子主张的性善论根本对立。
description.en: The theory of evil nature proposed by Xunzi is fundamentally opposed to the theory of good nature advocated by Mencius.

description.zh-cn: 刘向收集并编辑了荀子的著作，整理出32篇并合称为《孙卿书》。
description.en: Liu Xiang collected and edited the writings of Xunzi, compiling 32 chapters into a work titled 'Sun Qing Shu'.

description.zh-cn: 杨倞校勘与注解了《孙卿书》，并将其重新命名为《荀子》。
description.en: Yang Liang collated and annotated the 'Sun Qing Shu' and renamed it 'Xunzi'.

description.zh-cn: 荀子被一些学者认为是法家的先驱，其弟子韩非、李斯是法家代表人物，其思想可能促进了法家的发展。
description.en: Xunzi is considered by some scholars to be a forerunner of Legalism; his disciples Han Fei and Li Si were representative figures of Legalism, and his thought may have promoted its development.

description.zh-cn: 宋代理学家朱熹严厉批评荀子，几乎否认其儒家身份。
description.en: The Song Dynasty Neo-Confucian Zhu Xi severely criticized Xunzi, almost denying his status as a Confucian.

description.zh-cn: 宋代理学家程颐批评荀子的性恶说，并认为圣人之道因荀子而失传。
description.en: The Song Dynasty Neo-Confucian Cheng Yi criticized Xunzi's theory of evil nature and believed that the Way of the Sages was lost because of him.

description.zh-cn: 清末思想家谭嗣同批评荀子，将其学说归咎为中国两千年专制君权的源头。
description.en: The late Qing thinker Tan Sitong criticized Xunzi, blaming his teachings as the source of two millennia of autocratic monarchy in China.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间的“批孔扬秦”运动中，荀子因其法家弟子韩非、李斯而受到赞扬。
description.en: During the 'Criticize Confucius, Praise Qin' campaign of the Cultural Revolution, Xunzi was praised because of his Legalist disciples, Han Fei and Li Si.
